trans-unit.source: Caution: The discount applied to a category does not stack with the overall reduction but instead replaces it.
trans-unit.target: Opozorilo: Popust te kategorije se ne odšteje splošnemu spustu cen ampak ga nadomesti.

trans-unit.source: Only products that have this category as the default category will be affected.
trans-unit.target: Spremembe bodo vplivale samo na produkte, ki imajo to kategorijo nastavljeno kot privzeto.

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete this shop (customer and/or order dependency)
trans-unit.target: Ne morete izbrisati podatkov iz te trgovine (obstaja odvisnost strank ali česa drugega)

trans-unit.source: Click here to set a URL for this shop.
trans-unit.target: Kliknite sem za nastavitev URL-ja trgovine.

trans-unit.source: Width and height must be numeric values.
trans-unit.target: Višina in širina morajo biti v številkah.

trans-unit.source: The discount value is incorrect (must be a percentage).
trans-unit.target: Vrednost popusta ni veljavna (mora bit v odstotkih).

trans-unit.source: Wrong category ID.
trans-unit.target: Napačen ID kategorije.

trans-unit.source: The discount value is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Vrednost popusta ni pravilna.

trans-unit.source: You cannot save group reductions.
trans-unit.target: Skupinskih popustov ne morete shraniti.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while updating this group.
trans-unit.target: Nastala je napaka med posodabljanjem te skupine.

trans-unit.source: Aliases and results are both required.
Is not a valid result
trans-unit.target: ni veljaven rezultat

trans-unit.source: Is not a valid alias
trans-unit.target: ni veljaven alias

trans-unit.source: This is not a valid IP address:
trans-unit.target: To ni veljaven IP naslov:

trans-unit.source: You cannot delete this shop (customer and/or order dependency).
trans-unit.target: Ne morete izbrisati podatkov iz te trgovine (obstaja odvisnost strank ali česa drugega).

trans-unit.source: Please create some sub-categories for this root category.
trans-unit.target: Ustvarite nekaj podkategorij za to korensko kategorijo.

trans-unit.source: You need to select at least the root category.
trans-unit.target: Izbrati morate vsaj korensko kategorijo.

trans-unit.source: Warning: You won't be able to change the group of this shop if this shop belongs to a group with one of these options activated: Share Customers, Share Quantities or Share Orders.
trans-unit.target: Opozorilo: Če ta trgovina spada v skupino, v kateri je aktivna vsaj ena od teh možnosti (pokaži kupce, pokaži količino ali pokaži naročila), sprememba skupine te trgovine ne bo mogoča.

trans-unit.source: You can only move your shop to a shop group with all "share" options disabled -- or to a shop group with no customers/orders.
trans-unit.target: Svojo trgovino lahko premaknete v skupino prodajaln, ki ima vse opcije "deli" onemogočene-- ali v skupino trgovin brez kupcev/naročil.

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, you cannot delete default order statuses.
trans-unit.target: Zaradi varnosti ne moreš brisati stanj naročil

trans-unit.source: An address located in a country containing states must have a state selected.
trans-unit.target: Naslov v državi, ki ima zvezne države, mora imeti izbrano zvezno državo.

trans-unit.source: Latitude and longitude are required.
trans-unit.target: Zemljepisna širina in dolžina sta obvezni

trans-unit.source: The specified state is not located in this country.
trans-unit.target: Ta država ni v tej državi.

trans-unit.source: Before being able to use this tool, you need to:
trans-unit.target: Preden lahko uporabljate to orodje, morate:

trans-unit.source: Create a blank .htaccess in your root directory.
trans-unit.target: Ustvarite prazen .htaccess v vašem korenskem direktoriju.

trans-unit.source: Give it write permissions (CHMOD 666 on Unix system).
trans-unit.target: - dajte dovoljenje za pisanje (CHMOD 666 na Unix sistemih).

trans-unit.source: You must define an SMTP server and an SMTP port. If you do not know it, use the PHP mail() function instead.
trans-unit.target: Opredeliti morate SMTP strežnik in STMP vhodna vrata. V primeru, da le teh ne poznate, uporabite PHP mail() funkcijo.

trans-unit.source: Assign a valid page if you want it to be read.
trans-unit.target: Določite veljavno stran, če jo želite prikazati za branje.

trans-unit.source: Your robots.txt file MUST be in your website's root directory and nowhere else (e.g. http://www.example.com/robots.txt).
trans-unit.target: Vaša robots.txt datoteka MORA biti v korenskem direktoriju in nikjer drugje (npr. http://www.yoursite.com/robots.txt).

trans-unit.source: Generate your "robots.txt" file by clicking on the following button (this will erase the old robots.txt file)
trans-unit.target: Generirajte vašo "robots.txt" datoteko s klikom na gumb (to bo izbrisalo staro robots.txt datoteko)

trans-unit.source: Before you can use this tool, you need to:
trans-unit.target: Preden lahko začnete uporabljati to orodje, morate:

trans-unit.source: 1) Create a blank robots.txt file in your root directory.
trans-unit.target: 1) Ustvarite prazno robots.txt datoteko v vašem korenskem direktoriju.

trans-unit.source: 2) Give it write permissions (CHMOD 666 on Unix system).
trans-unit.target: 2) Dodajte pravice zapisovanja (CHMOD 666 na Unix system).

trans-unit.source: The multistore option is enabled. If you want to change the URL of your shop, you must go to the "Multistore" page under the "Advanced Parameters" menu.
trans-unit.target: Opcija multistore je omogočena. Če želite spremeniti URL vaše strani, pojdite na stran "Multistore" in ustrezno priredite vrednost v meniju "Napredni Parametri".

trans-unit.source: Here you can set the URL for your shop. If you migrate your shop to a new URL, remember to change the values below.
trans-unit.target: Tukaj lahko shranite URL za vašo trgovino. Če želite vašo trgovino preseliti na nov URL, ne pozabite spodaj spremeniti vrednosti.

trans-unit.source: This section enables you to change the default pattern of your links. In order to use this functionality, PrestaShop's "Friendly URL" option must be enabled, and Apache's URL rewriting module (mod_rewrite) must be activated on your web server.
trans-unit.target: Ta sekcija vam dovoljuje spremembo privzetega vzorca za vaše povezave. Če želite uporabiti to finkcijo, PrestaShop "prijazni URL" mora biti možnost omogočena in Apache modul za prepisovanje URL (mod_rewrite) mora biti aktiviran na vašem strežniku.

trans-unit.source: There are several available keywords for each route listed below; note that keywords with * are required!
trans-unit.target: Na voljo je več ključnih besed za vsako pot na spodnjem seznamu; ključne besede z * so zahtevane!

trans-unit.source: To add a keyword in your URL, use the {keyword} syntax. If the keyword is not empty, you can add text before or after the keyword with syntax {prepend:keyword:append}. For example {-hey-:meta_title} will add "-hey-my-title" in the URL if the meta title is set.
trans-unit.target: Da dodate ključne besede v vaš URL, uporabite {keyword} sintakso. Če ključne besede niso prazne, lahko dodate tekst pred ali za ključnimi besedami s sintakso {prepend:keyword:append}. Na primer {-hey-:meta_title} bo dodalo "-hey-my-title" v URL, če je nastavljen meta naslov.

trans-unit.source: You can only display the page list in a shop context.
trans-unit.target: Seznam strani lahko prikažete le v kontekstu trgovine.
